ATLX Schedule
dances, bands, DJ’s & venues

Friday, June 2, 2016

RESURGENS: Main Dance
ATLX is back in style, baby. Join us for the first re-inauguration of the new, revitalized, revamperized ATLX. Be there, or be a square!
Venue
 Georgia Tech Ballroom
7:00pm - 8:00pm
Beginner Lindy Hop Lesson
8:00pm - 12:00am
Boilermaker Jazz Band
Friday Late Night
DJ Gearhart will spin your favorite dance tunes to move your feet to in the main room, while DJ Kevin Kim is going to blue your soul with his sweet rhythms in our blues room. You won't want to miss being blue'n away.
We also have snacks. Snacks!
Venue
 Georgia Tech Ballroom
12:00am - 4:00am
Lindy Hop Room: DJ Gearhart
12:00am - 4:00am
Blues Room: DJ Kevin Kim

Saturday, June 3, 2016

Dancin' in the Park
We bring back the annual celebration of dancing at the park. We'll be dancing and throwing a picnic in a park!
Venue
 Piedmont Park
2:00pm - 5:00pm
Picnic and Lindy Hop: DJ Cate
The Main Dance
The main dance is the crown upon ATLX. Hawaiian shirts optional but highly encouraged.
Venue
 Georgia Tech Ballroom
8:00pm - 12:00am
Boilermaker Jazz Band
Saturday Late Night Dance
Saturday Late Night is better than SNL!
Venue
 Georgia Tech Ballroom
12:00am - 4:00am
Lindy Hop Room: DJ Gearhart
12:00am - 4:00am
Blues Room: DJ Kevin Kim

Sunday, June 4, 2016

Afternoon Dance
Nice and tidy picnic dance at Decatur Square.
Venue
 Decatur Square
1:00pm - 4:00pm
Picnic and Dance: DJ Bob
Evening Dance
We're finishing up ATLX with a dance in a nice little cottage in the woods
Venue
 Garden Hills Community Center
6:00pm - 11:00pm
Dancing in the Woods: DJ Kaz

Monday, June 5, 2016

Hot Jam, Bonus Dance!
We have a bonus dance on Monday called Hot Jam! This is our local scene dance. Come join us!
Venue
 Garden Hills Community Center
9:00pm - 11:00pm
Hot Jam: DJ Kaz

* WARNING: RESULTS MAY VARY. CONSUME AT YOUR OWN RISK. LINDY HOP MAY CAUSE DIZZINESS, EXCITEDNESS, AND HAPPINESS, AND MAY LEAD TO UNEXPLAINED GRINS TO DEVELOP ON YOUR VISAGE. PROLONGED EXPOSURE TO EXCESSIVE SWING-OUTS MAY ALSO CAUSE ADDITIONAL BLURRED VISION OR LIGHTHEADEDNESS. BEFORE PARTAKING IN LINDY HOP, PLEASE CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR OR PHARMACIST ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE EXPECTING, PLANNING TO EXPECT, EXPECTING TO PLAN, OR A COMBINATION THEREOF. DRINKING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES MIGHT CLOUD YOUR JUDGMENT AND MAY CAUSE YOU TO BELIEVE YOU ARE A BETTER DANCER THAN YOU ACTUALLY ARE. DO NOT LINDY HOP WHILE DRIVING OR OPERATING HEAVY MACHINERY. DOING SO MAY RESULT IN SEVERE INJURIES INCLUDING DISMEMBERMENT, AND/OR DEATH. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED. HAVE A NICE DAY.
